# uptimekuma_notification_pushplus (Resource)

PushPlus notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_pushplus" "example" {
  name      = "PushPlus Notification"
  send_key  = "your-pushplus-send-key"
  is_active = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `send_key` (String, Sensitive) PushPlus send key for authentication

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
